Desc.entry: A registered charity which offers free pregnancy test and counselling for unplanned pregnancy. Provides unbiased information on becoming a parent, adoption and abortion. Also provides counselling for anyone who has experienced pregnancy loss. Run by trained volunteers and committed to providing a safe space for anyone who is affected by these issues.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Sat 11am-1pm by appointment only, other days and times for appointments can be arranged
